sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-stage :config="configKonva">
    <v-layer>
      <v-circle :config="configCircle"></v-circle>
    </v-layer>
  </v-stage>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  data() {
    return {
      stageConfig: {
        width: 400,
        height: 400,
      },
      rectConfig: {
        x: 50,
        y: 50,
        width: 100,
        height: 100,
        fill: "green",
      },
      rectStroke: "black", // Border color
    };
  },
  methods: {
    changeColor() {
      // Toggle between green and blue
      this.rectConfig.fill =
        this.rectConfig.fill === "green" ? "blue" : "green";
    },
  },
};
</script>
